sentences.en: Basic seam allowances are usually added to the blocks.
sentences.cn: 通常在样板上加上基本缝份.

sentences.en: During recent years the seam cut has once again come into use.
sentences.cn: 近几年来,又再度使用了裂缝掏槽.

sentences.en: His shirt ripped at the seam.

sentences.cn: 我可以把这些缝口拆开.

sentences.en: Seam must be the correct width as per original spec sheet.
sentences.cn: 接缝宽度必须按原规格资料.

sentences.en: Seam weaves a concurrency management layer into its context model.
sentences.cn: Seam将并发管理层组织进它的上下文模型中.

sentences.en: She hunted about everywhere , ballyragging Jack by side and by seam.
sentences.cn: 她一面这儿那儿找, 一面嘴里把捷克骂了个狗血喷头.

sentences.en: She was repairing Billy’s trousers, where the seam had come undone.
sentences.cn: 她在补比利裤子的开线处。

sentences.en: Tack them together with a 1.5 cm seam.
sentences.cn: 用1.5厘米的针脚将它们暂时缝上。

sentences.en: the attitude of the airport guard was symptomatic of a system falling apart at the seams.
sentences.cn: 机场警卫的态度是系统行将崩溃的征兆。

sentences.en: The average UK coal seam is one metre thick.
sentences.cn: 英国煤层的平均厚度为1米。

sentences.en: The Main Chromitite Seam and the Merensky Reef do not outcrop well.
sentences.cn: 主铬铁岩矿层及麦仑斯基矿层出露不好.

sentences.en: The seam of his coat is pulled.
sentences.cn: 他外套的线缝被撕开了.

sentences.en: Use vinyl seam adhesive where vinyls overlap.
sentences.cn: 塑料布相叠处用塑料封口胶粘起来。

sentences.en: Usually, conversation state is actually held by Seam in the servlet session between requests.
sentences.cn: 通常, 对话的状态在请求之间Servlet会话中由Seam实际持有.

sentences.en: We can reset the seam and take in some of the material.
sentences.cn: 我们可以重新安排缝口,并收进一点衣料.

words.tran_cn: 无缝的；无缝合线的；无伤痕的
缝合；接合；使产生皱纹/伤痕；产生裂缝（原形seam）

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（地方，建筑）拥挤不堪的；人满为患的
(非正式)（人，系统）状况不好的；濒临崩溃的
纵接缝；纵向焊缝；纵向缝
用…而留下伤疤；因…而长了皱纹
侧缝；侧骨；摆缝；水平焊缝

trans.tran_cn: 接缝，接合处，煤层，线缝，裂缝
trans.tran_en: a line where two pieces of cloth, leather etc have been stitched together
a line where two pieces of cloth, leather etc have been stitched together
